q: What are your shipping options and delivery times?
a: We offer free worldwide shipping. Orders are processed in 1-2 business days. Typical delivery times: 3-5 business days in North America, 5-10 days internationally. You’ll receive tracking by email as soon as your order ships.

q: What is your return and exchange policy?
a: You can return or exchange any watch within 30 days in new condition with original packaging. Returns are free for defects; otherwise a small return label fee may apply depending on your region.

q: Do your watches have a warranty?
a: Yes—lifetime movement warranty and 2 years on materials and craftsmanship. Straps and normal wear are not covered. Contact support with your order number for a fast repair or replacement.

q: Can I swim or dive with these watches?
a: Our 10ATM watches are suitable for swimming and snorkeling. 20ATM models (e.g., Oceanic, Trailmaster) are dive-ready. Avoid hot showers and saunas as heat and pressure can compromise seals.
We use 316L stainless steel, grade-5 titanium for lighter builds, ceramic bezels for scratch resistance, and sapphire crystals. Straps include leather, steel bracelets, rubber, and nylon.
Our collection includes Swiss automatic movements tuned to ±3 seconds/day and solar quartz for set-and-forget convenience.

q: How do I choose the right size?
a: Most models are 39–42mm which fits a wide range of wrists. For slimmer wrists, consider Minimalist (38mm). For larger presence, Oceanic (42mm) or Metro Chrono (41mm).
We occasionally run seasonal promotions. Subscribe to our newsletter at checkout to be notified. Free shipping is always included.
Human support is available Mon–Fri, 9am–6pm local time. The AI assistant is available 24/7.
